title: Why We Shouldn’t Bring Back Gatekeepers
description: Put simply: Once established institutions lost the privilege to control the public conversation, they acquired an obligation to participate within it, which, so far, they have mostly failed to do. – Conspicuous Cognition
content: A consensus view holds that social media benefits something called populism, an amorphous political force involving anger towards elites and the establishment on behalf of the more virtuous masses. T… [+32195 chars]
